00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00077 static double R_INLINE sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00078 {
00079     double ans = 0;
00080     int i;
00081 
00082     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00083     return ans;
00084 }
00085 
00094 static int R_INLINE Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00095 {
00096     int i;
00097     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00098     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00099     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00100 }

00114 *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00115 {
00116     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00117     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;

00128 static double R_INLINE
00129 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* deviance)
00130 {
00131     return sqrt(exp(deviance[lpdisc_POS])/
00132                 ((double)(dims[n_POS] - (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))));
00133 }

00143 static double
00144 chm_log_det2(CHM_FR L)
00145 {
00146     double ans = 0;
00147     int i;
00148 
00149     if (L->is_super) {
00150         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00151             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00152                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00153             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00154 
00155             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00156                 ans += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00157             }
00158         }
00159     } else {
00160         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00161         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00162         
00163         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00164             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00165             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00166             ans += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00167         }
00168     }
00169     return ans;
00170 }
00171 
00185 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00186 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00187 {
00188     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00189 
00190     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00191         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00192         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00193 
00194         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00195         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00196         nc[i] = nci;
00197         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00198     }
00199     return ans;
00200 }
00201 
00216 static int
00217 C_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00218        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00219 {
00220     int ans, i, p;
00221 
00222     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00223     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00224         int zrow = zi[p];
00225         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00226 
00227         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00228         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00229             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00230             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00231                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00232         }
00233     }
00234     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00235     return ans;
00236 }
00237 
00253 static void
00254 TSPp_dense_mult(double *dx, int nf, int m, int n, double **st,
00255                 const int *nc, const int *nlev, const int *Gp,
00256                 const double *sx, const int *Perm)
00257 {
00258     int i, j, k;
00259     double *tmp = Alloca(m, double), one = 1;
00260     R_CheckStack(); 
00261 
00262     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00263                                 /* apply permutation if given */
00264         if (Perm) for (i = 0; i < m; i++) tmp[Perm[i]] = sx[j * m + i];
00265         else Memcpy(tmp, sx + j * m, m);
00266         for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00267             for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00268                 double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00269                 int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00270                 for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) tmp[base + kk] *= dd;
00271             }
00272             if (nc[i] > 1) {    /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00273                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00274                                 st[i], nc + i, tmp + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00275             }
00276         }
00277         Memcpy(dx + j * m, tmp, m);
00278     }
00279 }

00291 static void
00292 TSPp_SEXP_mult(SEXP dest, SEXP ST, const int *Gp, SEXP src, const int *Perm)
00293 {
00294     int isM = isMatrix(src), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00295     int m = isM ? INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol))[0] : LENGTH(src),
00296         n = isM ? INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol))[1] : 1;
00297     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00298     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00299     R_CheckStack(); 
00300 
00301     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00302     TSPp_dense_mult(REAL(dest), nf, m, n, st, nc, nlev, Gp, REAL(src), Perm);
00303 }

00314 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00315 {
00316     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00317         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00318         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00319         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00320     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00321         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00322     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00323         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00324         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00325     R_CheckStack();
00326     
00327     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00328     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00329     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00330     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00331         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00332         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00333             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00334             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00335                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00336             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00337         }
00338     }
00339     return R_NilValue;
00340 }
00341 
00350 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00351 {
00352     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00353     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00354     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00355         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00356         double *st = REAL(STi);
00357         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00358         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00359 
00360         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00361             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00362         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00363             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00364                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00365     }
00366     return pars;
00367 }

00376 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00377 {
00378     SEXP ans =
00379         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00380                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00381     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00382     UNPROTECT(1); 
00383     return ans;
00384 }
00385 
00393 static void
00394 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00395 {
00396     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00397     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00398     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym)),
00399         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00400     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00401         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00402         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00403     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00404     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00405     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00406         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00407         one[] = {1,0};
00408     R_CheckStack();
00409 
00410     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00411                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00412     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00413         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00414         double *sti = st[i];
00415 
00416         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00417             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00418         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00419             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00420                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00421     }
00422                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00423                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00424     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00425     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00426         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00427         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00428             int pv = vp[j];
00429             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00430                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00431                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00432                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00433                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00434             }
00435         }
00436     }
00437                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00438     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00439         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00440             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00441                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00442 
00443                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00444                 else {
00445                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00446                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00447                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00448                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00449                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00450                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00451                 }
00452             }
00453                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00454     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00455         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00456         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00457     }
00458 }

00469 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00470 {
00471     int npar = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS];
00472 
00473     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00474         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00475     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00476     return R_NilValue;
00477 }

00479 /* Functions common to all forms of mixed models */
00480 
00481 /* FIXME: Watch the definition of this scale factor.  It may be more
00482  * appropriate to use the weighted, penalized residual sum of squares
00483  * than to use the deviance. */
00492 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00493 {
00494     int w = asInteger(which);
00495                 
00496     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && isREML(x)),
00497                                 INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
00498                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00499 }
00500 
00509 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x, SEXP uS)
00510 {
00511     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00512         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00513     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00514     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00515     int i, j, k;
00516     double *vv, one[] = {1,0},
00517         sc = asLogical(uS) ?
00518              get_sigma(isREML(x), dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)))
00519             : 1;
00520     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00521     CHM_DN dm1;
00522     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00523     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00524         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00525     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00526     R_CheckStack();
00527 
00528     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00529     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00530     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00531         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00532         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00533                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00534                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00535 
00536         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00537         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00538         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00539         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00540             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00541         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00542             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00543             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00544                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i]];
00545             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00546             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00547             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00548             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00549             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00550             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00551             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00552             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00553             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00554                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00555                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00556                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00557                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00558             }
00559         }
00560         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00561     }
00562     UNPROTECT(1);
00563     return ans;
00564 }
00565 
00573 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP C)
00574 {
00575     double one[] = {1, 0};
00576     int fll = c.final_ll;
00577     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(C);
00578     CHM_FR L;
00579     R_CheckStack();
00580 
00581     c.final_ll = 1;
00582     L = M_cholmod_analyze(cC, &c);
00583     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(cC, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00584         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00585               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00586     c.final_ll = fll;
00587 
00588     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00589 }

00592 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00593 
00594 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00595 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00596 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00597 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00598 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;

00600 
00610 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00611 {
00612     SEXP X = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
00613         moff = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00614         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00615     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00616     int i, ione = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
00617     int nans = n * dims[s_POS];
00618     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00619         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00620         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00621         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00622         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00623         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00624         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00625         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00626         one[] = {1,0};
00627     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00628     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00629     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, nans, 1),
00630         cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym));
00631     R_CheckStack();
00632 
00633 /* FIXME: Should the option of not storing X be allowed? */
00634     if (!INTEGER(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol))[0]) { /* X not stored */
00635         for (i = 0; i < nans; i++) eta[i] = NA_REAL;
00636         return NA_REAL;
00637     }
00638                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00639     if (LENGTH(moff)) Memcpy(eta, REAL(moff), nans);
00640     else AZERO(eta, nans);
00641                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00642     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &nans, &p, one, REAL(X), &nans,
00643                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &ione,
00644                     one, eta, &ione);
00645                                 /* eta := eta + V P' u */
00646     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00647     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00648         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00649     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00650 
00651     if (LENGTH(v)) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00652         SEXP rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym);
00653         SEXP gg, pnames = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pnamesSym), vv;
00654         int *gdims, s = dims[s_POS];
00655         
00656         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00657             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00658                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00659             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00660                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00661                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00662             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00663         }
00664         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00665         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00666             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00667         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00668         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00669             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00670         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00671         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00672             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00673                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00674                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00675                                  * pnames has been checked */
00676         SET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym, vv);
00677         UNPROTECT(1);
00678         eta = REAL(vv);
00679     }
00680                                 /* eta now points to an n vector  */
00681     if (muEta) {        /* apply the generalized linear part */
00682         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00683         case 1:                 /* binomial with logit link */
00684             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00685                 double etai = eta[i];
00686                 double tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00687                     ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00688                 mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00689                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00690             }
00691             break;
00692         case 2:                 /* binomial with probit link */
00693             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00694                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00695                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00696             }
00697             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00698                 double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00699                 mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00700                     ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00701                      pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00702                 var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00703                 tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00704                 muEta[i] =
00705                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00706             }
00707             break;
00708         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00709             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00710                 double tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00711                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] =
00712                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00713             }
00714             break;
00715         default:
00716             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00717         } 
00718     } else {
00719         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00720     }
00721 
00722     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00723     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00724         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (swt ? swt[i] : 1);
00725         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00726     }
00727                                 /* store u'u */
00728     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00729     
00730     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00731 }
00732 
00743 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00744 {
00745     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00746 }
00747 
00758 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00759 {
00760     SEXP vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00761     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00762     int j, jv, lv = LENGTH(vP),
00763         n = dims[n_POS], p, s = dims[s_POS];
00764     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00765         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00766         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00767         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00768         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00769         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00770         one[] = {1,0};
00771     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00772     CHM_SP A = C;
00773     int *ai = (int*) NULL, *ap = (int*) NULL,
00774         *vi = (int*) C->i, *vp = (int*) C->p;
00775     double *ax = (double*) NULL, *vx = (double*) C->x;
00776     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00777     R_CheckStack();
00778 
00779     if (lv || muEta || swt) {   /* must generate A from C */
00780         A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00781         R_CheckStack();
00782         ai = (int*)(A->i); ap = (int*)(A->p); ax = (double*)(A->x);
00783         
00784         if (lv) { /* apply the gradient from the nonlinear model */
00785             double *grad = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
00786             
00787             AZERO(ax, ap[n]);
00788             for (jv = 0; jv < n * s; jv++) {
00789                 int iv, ja = jv % n, ia;
00790                 for (iv = vp[jv]; iv < vp[jv + 1]; iv++) {
00791                     for (ia = ap[ja]; ia < ap[ja + 1]; ia++)
00792                         if (ai[ia] == vi[iv]) break;
00793                     if (ia == ap[ja + 1])
00794                         error(_("Structure of A incompatible with C, jv = %d, iv = %d"),
00795                               jv, iv);
00796                     ax[ia] += grad[jv] * vx[iv];
00797                 }
00798             }
00799         } else {                /* copy contents of C to A */
00800             Memcpy(ax, vx, ap[n]);
00801         }
00802 
00803         if (swt) {              /* update swt and res. Apply swt and,
00804                                  * if used, muEta to A */
00805             double *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
00806                 *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym);
00807             d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00808             for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00809                 swt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / (var ? var[j] : 1));
00810                 res[j] = swt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00811                 d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00812                 for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00813                     ax[p] *= (muEta ? muEta[j] : 1) * swt[j];
00814             }
00815         }
00816     }
00817 
00818     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00819         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00820               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00821     d[ldL2_POS] = chm_log_det2(L);
00822     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00823 }
00824 
00836 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00837 {
00838     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00839 }
00840 
00842 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00843 
00844 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00845 
00846 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00847 
00857 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00858 {
00859     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00860     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00861     double
00862         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00863         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)),
00864         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00865         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, one[] = {1,0},
00866         step, zero[] = {0,0};
00867     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double),
00868         *uold = Alloca(q, double);
00869     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00870     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00871         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00872     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00873     R_CheckStack();
00874 
00875     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00876     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00877 
00878     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00879      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00880      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00881      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00882 
00883     AZERO(u, q);
00884     update_mu(x);
00885     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00886 
00887         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00888         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00889                                 /* tmp := A %*% W^{1/2} %*% (y-mu) */
00890         if (!(M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 0 /* no trans */, one, zero,
00891                                cres, ctmp, &c))) 
00892             error(_("cholmod_sdmult returned error code"));
00893                                 /* tmp := P %*% tmp - u */
00894         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_P, L, ctmp, &c);
00895         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] = ((double*)(sol->x))[j] - u[j];
00896         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00897                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
00898         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
00899             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
00900         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00901         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00902                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
00903         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
00904         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
00905                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
00906         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
00907             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
00908         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00909         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00910 
00911         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
00912             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
00913             pwrss = update_mu(x);
00914             if (verb < 0)
00915                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
00916                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
00917             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
00918                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
00919                 break;
00920             }
00921         }
00922         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
00923     }
00924     return i;
00925 }
00926 
00938 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
00939 {
00940     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
00941 }
00942 
00951 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00952 {
00953     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00954 }
00955 
00963 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
00964 {
00965     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
00966     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00967     int i, n = dims[n_POS];
00968 
00969     d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
00970     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) { /* generalized */
00971         SEXP pwtp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
00972         int pw = LENGTH(pwtp);
00973         double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00974             *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00975             *wts = REAL(pwtp),
00976             *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym));
00977 
00978         d[disc_POS] = 0;
00979         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00980         case 1:               /* binomial with logit or probit link */
00981         case 2:
00982             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00983                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00984                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00985                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00986             }
00987             break;
00988         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00989             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00990                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00991                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00992                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00993             }
00994             break;
00995         default:
00996             error(_("General form of glmer_dev_resids not yet written"));
00997         }
00998     }
00999 
01000     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01001     return R_NilValue;
01002 }
01003 
01012 SEXP mer_update_effects(SEXP x)
01013 {
01014     SEXP muEta = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01015         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
01016     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01017     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01018     R_CheckStack();
01019 
01020     if (!(LENGTH(muEta) || LENGTH(v))) { /* linear mixed model */
01021         SEXP uvec = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01022         int ione = 1, p = dims[p_POS], pp1 = dims[p_POS] + 1,
01023             q = dims[q_POS];
01024         double *RXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01025             *RVXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01026             *dev = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01027             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01028             *u = REAL(uvec), mone = -1, one = 1;
01029         CHM_DN cu = AS_CHM_DN(uvec), sol;
01030         R_CheckStack();
01031 
01032         Memcpy(fixef, RXy + p * pp1, p);
01033         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RXy, &pp1, fixef, &ione);
01034         Memcpy(u, RVXy + p * q, q);
01035         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, RVXy, &q,
01036                         fixef, &ione, &one, u, &ione);
01037         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
01038             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
01039         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01040         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01041         dev[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
01042         dev[disc_POS] = exp(dev[lpdisc_POS]) - dev[usqr_POS];
01043     }
01044     TSPp_SEXP_mult(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01045                    GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01046                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
01047                    GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01048                    (int *)L->Perm);
01049     return R_NilValue;
01050 }
01051 
01063 SEXP mer_create_C(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01064 {
01065     SEXP ans;
01066     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01067         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01068     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01069     R_CheckStack();
01070 
01071                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01072     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01073         return duplicate(Zt);
01074                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01075     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01076     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01077     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01078     R_CheckStack();
01079 
01080     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01081     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01082     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01083         nnz[j] = C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01084         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01085     }
01086     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01087                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01088     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01089     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01090     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01091                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01092     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01093     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01094     vp[0] = 0;
01095     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01096     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01097                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01098     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01099     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01100     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01101         int i, pos = vp[j];
01102         C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01103         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01104     }
01105                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01106     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01107     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01108 
01109     UNPROTECT(1); 
01110     return ans;
01111 }
01112 
01125 static void
01126 PAWv(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01127       const double *swt, const double *v, int n, int q)
01128 {
01129     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), j, k, p;
01130     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(q, double);
01131     R_CheckStack();
01132 
01133     AZERO(tmp, q);
01134     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01135         double mm = v[j] * (swt ? swt[j] : 1);
01136         for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01137             tmp[ai[p]] += mm * ax[p];
01138     }
01139     for (k = 0; k < q; k++)     /* apply P */
01140         dest[k] = tmp[perm ? perm[k] : k];
01141 }
01142 
01143 static void
01144 weighted_XytXy(double *rxy, const double *swt, double *X,
01145                double *y, int n, int p)
01146 {
01147     int i, ione = 1, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01148     double one = 1, zero = 0;
01149     double *Xcp = X, *ycp = y;
01150     
01151     if (swt) {                  /* created weighted copies of X and y */
01152         Xcp = Alloca(n * p, double),
01153         ycp = Alloca(n, double);
01154         R_CheckStack();
01155         
01156         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ycp[i] = swt[i] * y[i];
01157         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01158             for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01159                 Xcp[i + j * n] = swt[i] * X[i + j * n];
01160     }
01161     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, &one, Xcp, &n, &zero, rxy, &pp1);
01162     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, &one, Xcp, &n, ycp, &ione, &zero,
01163                     rxy + p * pp1, &ione);
01164     rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1] = F77_CALL(ddot)(&n, ycp, &ione, ycp, &ione);
01165 }
01166         
01174 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01175 {
01176     SEXP RVXyP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym);
01177     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01178     int j, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01179     int pp1 = p + 1;
01180     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)),
01181         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01182         *rvxy = REAL(RVXyP),
01183         *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01184         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
01185         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01186         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01187         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01188     CHM_SP A =
01189         AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, swt ? lme4_ASym : lme4_CmSym));
01190     CHM_DN cRVXy = AS_CHM_DN(RVXyP), ans;
01191     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01192     R_CheckStack();
01193 
01194     update_L(x);
01195                                 /* Evaluate PAW^{1/2}[X:y] in RVXy */
01196     for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01197         PAWv(rvxy + j * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, X + j * n, n, q);
01198     PAWv(rvxy + p * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, y, n, q);
01199                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01200     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRVXy, &c);
01201     Memcpy(rvxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * pp1);
01202     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01203                                 /* downdate XytXy  */
01204                                 /* Evaluate [X:y]'W[X:y] in RXy */
01205     weighted_XytXy(rxy, swt, X, y, n, p);
01206     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &pp1, &q, mone, rvxy, &q, one, rxy, &pp1);
01207     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &pp1, rxy, &pp1, &j);
01208     if (j)
01209         error(_("Downdated [X:y]'[X:y] is not positive definite, %d."),
01210               j);
01211     if ((!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) &&
01212         (!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym)))) { /* linear mixed model */
01213         d[lpdisc_POS] = 2 * log(rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1]);
01214         for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < (pp1 - 1); j++)
01215             d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (pp1 + 1)]);
01216         d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01217             dn * (1 + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2 * PI / dn));
01218         d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01219             dnmp * (1. + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01220     }
01221     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01222 }
01223 
01232 SEXP
01233 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01234 {
01235     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01236 }
01237 
01247 SEXP 
01248 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01249 {
01250     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01251     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01252         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01253     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01254                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym))),
01255         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01256 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe). */
01257     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01258     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01259     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01260     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01261     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01262     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01263         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01264     R_CheckStack();
01265 
01266     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01267     if (!lmm) {
01268         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01269 
01270         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01271         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01272         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01273         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01274     }
01275                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01276     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01277     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01278                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01279     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01280         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01281     }
01282                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01283     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01284         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01285         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01286         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01287     }
01288     do {
01289         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01290         if (lmm)
01291             fx = update_RX(x);
01292         else {
01293             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01294             update_u(x, verb);
01295             mer_update_dev(x);
01296             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01297         }
01298         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01299     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01300     update_RX(x);
01301     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01302     return R_NilValue;
01303 }
01304 
01305 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01306 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01307 
01320 static double
01321 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01322 {
01323     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01324 
01325     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01326         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01327     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01328         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01329         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01330             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01331                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01332             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01333             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01334         }
01335     }
01336     return ans;
01337 }
01338 
01348 SEXP
01349 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01350 {
01351     SEXP ans;
01352     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01353         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01354     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01355 
01356     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01357         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01358     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01359     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01360     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01361     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01362     R_CheckStack();
01363 
01364     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01365     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01366     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01367     if (j)
01368         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01369     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01370     ansp = REAL(ans);
01371     GetRNGstate();
01372     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01373         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01374         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01375         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01376                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01377         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01378                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01379                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01380 
01381         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01382             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01383                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01384     }
01385 
01386     PutRNGstate();
01387     UNPROTECT(1);
01388     return ans;
01389 }
01390 
01391 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01392 
01393 
01402 static void MCMC_betab(SEXP x, double sigma)
01403 {
01404     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01405         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01406     int ione = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01407     int pp1 = p + 1;
01408     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01409     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01410     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01411     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01412     R_CheckStack();
01413 
01414     mer_update_effects(x);
01415                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01416     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01417     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01418                     &pp1, del2, &ione);
01419     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01420                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01421     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01422     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01423                     &q, del2, &ione, &one, del1, &ione);
01424     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01425     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01426     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01427                                 /* Update the random effects */
01428     TSPp_SEXP_mult(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym), GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01429                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)), uvecP, (int*)(L->Perm));
01430 }
01431 
01432 static void
01433 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01434 {
01435     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01436     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01437         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01438         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01439 
01440     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01441     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01442     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01443     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01444         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01445         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01446         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01447     }
01448 }
01449 
01450 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01451 {
01452     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01453     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01454         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01455     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01456         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01457     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01458     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01459     R_CheckStack();
01460 
01461     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01462     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01463     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01464     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01465     R_CheckStack();
01466     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01467         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01468         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01469         
01470         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01471         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01472                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01473         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01474         else {
01475             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01476             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01477             if (info)
01478                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01479         }
01480                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01481         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01482         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01483                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01484         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01485                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01486         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01487                         &zero, var, &nci);
01488         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01489             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01490         }
01491         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01492             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01493                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01494                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01495                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01496             }
01497         }
01498         if (nci == 1) {
01499             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01500         } else {
01501             double *sti = st[i];
01502 
01503             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01504                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01505                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01506                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01507             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01508             if (info)
01509                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01510             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01511                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01512                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01513                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01514             }
01515         }
01516     }
01517 }
01518 
01532 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01533                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01534 {
01535     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01536     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01537     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01538         n = dims[n_POS], nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01539         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01540         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01541         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01542     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01543         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01544         *ranef = (double*)NULL, df = n - (dims[REML_POS] ? p : 0);
01545     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01546     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01547 
01548     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01549     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01550     ansp = REAL(ans);
01551     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01552     GetRNGstate();
01553     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01554     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01555 
01556     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01557         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01558                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01559         sigma = exp(deviance[lpdisc_POS]/2)/sqrt(rchisq(df));
01560         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01561         mer_update_effects(x);  /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01562         MCMC_betab(x, sigma); /* Updated beta, u and b */
01563         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01564         if (saveb)                                 /* store b */
01565             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01566         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01567 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     /\* Refactor and evaluate deviance *\/ */
01568         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01569         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01570         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01571     }
01572     PutRNGstate();
01573                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01574     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01575 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01576 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01577     UNPROTECT(2);
01578     return ans;
01579 }
01580 
01593 static char
01594 *chkDims(char *buf, int nb, char *nm, SEXP MP, int nr, int nc)
01595 {
01596     int *dd = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) :
01597         (int *)NULL;
01598 
01599     if (!dd) error(_("Argument MP to chkDims is not a matrix"));
01600     buf[0] = '\0';
01601     if (!isReal(MP) || dd[0] != nr || dd[1] != nc)
01602         snprintf(buf, nb, "Matrix %s must be a %d by %d numeric matrix",
01603                 nm, nr, nc);
01604     return buf;
01605 }
01606 
01607 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01608 
01609 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01610 #endif  
01611 
01620 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01621 {
01622     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01623         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01624         XP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
01625         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01626         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01627         etaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym),
01628         fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01629         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym),
01630         muP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym),
01631         muEtaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01632         offsetP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
01633         ranefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01634         residP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym),
01635         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01636         vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym),
01637         weightsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
01638         y = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym);
01639     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01640     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01641         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01642     int neta = n * s;
01643     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01644         C =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01645     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01646     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01647     R_CheckStack();
01648                                 /* check lengths */
01649     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01650         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01651     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01652         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01653     if (LENGTH(y) != n)
01654         return mkString(_("Slot y must have length dims['n']"));
01655     if (LENGTH(muP) != n)
01656         return mkString(_("Slot mu must have length dims['n']"));
01657     if (LENGTH(residP) != n)
01658         return mkString(_("Slot resid must have length dims['n']"));
01659     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01660         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01661     if (LENGTH(fixefP) != p)
01662         return mkString(_("Slot fixef must have length ['p']"));
01663     if (LENGTH(ranefP) != q)
01664         return mkString(_("Slot ranef must have length dims['q']"));
01665     if (LENGTH(uvecP) != q)
01666         return mkString(_("Slot uvec must have length dims['q']"));
01667     if (LENGTH(etaP) != neta)
01668         return mkString(_("Slot eta must have length dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01669     if (LENGTH(weightsP) && LENGTH(weightsP) != n)
01670         return mkString(_("Slot weights must have length 0 or dims['n']"));
01671     if (LENGTH(offsetP) && LENGTH(offsetP) != n)
01672         return mkString(_("Slot offset must have length 0 or dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01673     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01674         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01675         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01676     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01677         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01678         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01679     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01680         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01681     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != neta)
01682         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01683     if (C->nrow != q || C->ncol != neta)
01684         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01685     dd = INTEGER(getAttrib(XP, R_DimSymbol)); 
01686     if (!isReal(XP) || dd[1] != p)
01687         return mkString(_("Slot X must be a numeric matrix with dims['p'] columns"));
01688     if (dd[0] != 0 && dd[0] != (n * s)) /* special case */
01689         return mkString(_("Slot X must be have 0 or dims['n']*dims['s'] rows"));
01690 
01691     nq = 0;
01692     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01693         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01694         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01695         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01696             return
01697                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01698         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01699             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01700         if (!isFactor(fli))
01701             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01702         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01703     }
01704     if (q != nq)
01705         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01706     if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RVXy",
01707                        GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym), q, p + 1)))
01708         return mkString(buf);
01709     if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RXy",
01710                        GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym), p + 1, p + 1)))
01711         return mkString(buf);
01712     return ScalarLogical(1);
01713 }
01714 
01715 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01716 
01726 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01727 {
01728     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01729     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01730         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01731         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01732         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01733         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01734     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01735 
01736     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01737     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01738     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01739         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01740         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01741             F[i] = 0;
01742             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01743         } else {
01744             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01745                 F[i] = 0;
01746                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01747             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01748                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01749                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01750                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01751                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01752                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01753                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01754                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01755                             int ii = ai[k];
01756                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01757                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01758                         }
01759                     }
01760                 }
01761             }
01762         }
01763         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01764     }
01765     return ans;
01766 }
01767 
01768 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01781 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01782 {
01783     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01784     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01785     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01786         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01787         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01788     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01789       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01790     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01791         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01792     R_CheckStack();
01793     
01794     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01795     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01796         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01797         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01798         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01799     }
01800     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01801     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01802     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01803     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01804         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01805         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01806                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01807         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01808         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01809             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01810         }
01811         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01812             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01813         }
01814     
01815         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01816         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01817         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01818         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01819             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01820             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01821             if (S) {
01822                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01823                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01824                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01825                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01826                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01827             }
01828             if (D) {
01829                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01830                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01831             }
01832             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01833             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01834             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01835                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01836                                       * evaluated */
01837         } 
01838     }
01839     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01840     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01841     UNPROTECT(1);
01842     return ans;
01843 }
